Author: jorgeortiz85
Content: One Reply: GMail's conversation view (why isn't this standard with every e-mail client?)

Author: Goladus
Content: It's still a bad idea to associate blog-writing skill with technical and even interpersonal skill.  It's also a bad idea to make too many assumptions about the reason why someone might choose not to have a blog.  A guy with a family might not want to risk getting the wrong sort of attention, for example.
